description: This filename defines a FastAPI web server for a support backend, including endpoints for tickets, comments, and knowledge base articles, with in-memory repositories for demo purposes.

classes.name: FastAPI
classes.description: Main FastAPI application instance with configured routes and middleware.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint that returns a simple message indicating service health.

methods.name: list_tickets( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional status filter"), tag: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional tag filter"), repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo), )
methods.description: Retrieve all tickets with optional filtering by status or tags.

methods.name: get_ticket(ticket_id: int, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Retrieve a specific ticket by its ID.

methods.name: update_ticket(ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
methods.description: Update an existing ticket by ID.

methods.name: list_comments(ticket_id: int, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))
methods.description: List all comments associated with a specific ticket.

methods.name: create_comment(ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))
methods.description: Create a new comment for a specific ticket, ensuring ID match.

methods.name: get_kb(article_id: int, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Retrieve a specific knowledge base article by ID.

methods.name: create_kb(payload: KBArticleCreate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Create a new knowledge base article.

methods.name: update_kb(article_id: int, payload: KBArticleUpdate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Update an existing knowledge base article.

methods.name: delete_kb(article_id: int, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Delete a knowledge base article by ID.

ctags.name: create_comment
ctags.pattern: /^def create_comment(ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get/
ctags.signature: (ticket_id: int, payload: CommentCreate, repo: CommentRepository = Depends(get_comment_repo))

ctags.name: list_tickets
ctags.signature: ( status: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional status filter"), tag: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Optional tag filter"), repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo), )

ctags.name: update_kb
ctags.pattern: /^def update_kb(article_id: int, payload: KBArticleUpdate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_rep/
ctags.signature: (article_id: int, payload: KBArticleUpdate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))

ctags.name: update_ticket
ctags.pattern: /^def update_ticket(ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ti/
ctags.signature: (ticket_id: int, payload: TicketUpdate, repo: TicketRepository = Depends(get_ticket_repo))
